<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.MultiSSOv2_SAML2_custom</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Logic to process SAML 2.0 Update 1 authentication for a multi-tenant single sign-on</description> <name>MultiSSOv2_SAML2_custom</name> <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");

type: 'MultiSSOv2_SAML2_custom' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-12-04 22:02:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>48d518ff73022300ec77bd49faf6a7f6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>MultiSSOv2_SAML2_custom</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Integration - Multiple Provider Single Sign-On (do not activate...use 'Integration - Multiple Provid" source="com.snc.integration.sso.multi">4762a9692fe21110d8a4d5f62799b613</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_48d518ff73022300ec77bd49faf6a7f6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-12-18 19:24:55</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>298</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
